title: Add kwarg-only 'requires_grad' parameter to Variable factories.
body_html: Functions that create variables, e.g. torch.ones_like currently always return Variables with requires_grad=False; this is less convenient than the existing Variable constructor that has a requires_grad parameter. This commit adds the parameter at the python binding level.
